name: Black Bean & Corn Salsa
description: Use as a salsa to top nachos, dunk chips, or fill tacos! Be sodium savvyâ€“ when choosing canned black beans, opt for low-sodium and give them a quick rinse after you drain them. Rinsing helps remove even more of the sodium.
preparation: In a Rectangular Steamer, microwave corn on high, with lid on for 2 minutes.
Combine corn with all other ingredients. Add a lively splash of lime juice and cilantro if desired. Serve warm or chilled.
tips: Tastes great with Tortilla Chips and Mexican Shrimp Salad.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving and 1 serving Baked Tortilla Chips.
